javax.constraints.impl.search.selectors

Class AbstractVarSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.constraints.impl.search.selectors.AbstractVarSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VarSelector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VarSelectorInputOrder, VarSelectorMinDomain, VarSelectorMinDomainMinValue, VarSelectorRandom

    public abstract class AbstractVarSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements VarSelector
    This abstract defines an interface for the selection of the constrained variable from a given array of variables.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      AbstractVarSelector(SearchStrategy strategy)
      Constructor from SearchStrategy

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      SearchStrategy getSearchStrategy()
      Return a search strategy with which this selector is associated
      Var[] getVars()
      Returns the array of constrained variables upon which this selector was defined.
      abstract int select()
      Returns the index of the selected variable in the array of constrained variables passed to the selector as a constructor parameter.

      • select

        public abstract int select()
        Returns the index of the selected variable in the array of constrained variables passed to the selector as a constructor parameter. If no variables to select, it returns -1;
        Specified by:
        select in interface VarSelector
        Returns:
        the index of the selected variable in the array of constrained variables upon which this selector was defined. Returns -1 if there are no variables to select.
